name: Crystom
description:
Last through the forest, climb through the mountains, walk into the distance heroically. You can explore everything! 

This thrilling game brings to life many things people wished for, superpowers and exploration. I have been waiting years for someone to create a game like this, too long. I have decided to create this myself because I want people to share the same vision I do, an amazing exploration game!

I have many planned features, unfortunately I am a one man team, so it may take me quite some time. Please stay with me as I develop this game. I hope to give players a great experience they will never forget.

Currently there is no main object, just explore and see what the game is about, I hope you all enjoy!
